channel.title: PlayerOption Help [Dementhium 639]

item.title: PlayerOption Help [Dementhium 639]
item.dc:creator: @Divini Divini
item.description:
@Divini wrote:

Hey, so i am trying to add a third option to a right click for players which says PlayerShop. I am trying to edit PlayerOption but when i try to get the packet it doesnâ€™t open what i want. Here is the code:

[CODE] public static final int FIRST_OPTION = 70;
public static final int TRADE_PLAYER = 27; // RIGHT!
public static final int FOLLOW_PLAYER = 80;
public static final int OPEN_PLAYERSHOP = 60;

@Override
public void handlePacket(Player player, Message packet) {
    switch (packet.getOpcode()) {
        case FIRST_OPTION:
            handleFirstOption(player, packet);
            break;
        case TRADE_PLAYER:
            handleTradeRequest(player, packet);
            break;
        case FOLLOW_PLAYER:
            Following.playerFollow(player, World.getWorld().getPlayers().get(packet.readLEShortA()));
            break;
		case OPEN_PLAYERSHOP:
            player.sendMessage("Player Shops coming soon!");
            break;	
    }
}[/CODE]

Maybe I have the OPEN_PLAYERSHOP = int wrong? Can someone fix it so it works?
Thanks.

Read full topic
